duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage a team of BI professionals, overseeing their development and performance.
Collaborate with stakeholders, business, and IT Data Warehouse Team to elicit and document business requirements for new reports.
Translate data results into written reports, tables, graphs, and charts to convey information to management.
Design, develop, and maintain reports and analytical tools, ensuring quality assurance and ongoing monitoring.
Provide technical support for existing reports, dashboards, or other tools, and analyze errors and inconsistencies in the data.
Teach and advocate the use of business intelligence tools across levels of the organization, handle Data Warehouse help desk tickets, and report project status to management.
Participate in due diligence and evaluation of systems for M&A Integration, and contribute to cross-organizational teams for SPC LOB Technology Initiatives.
Perform other duties as assigned, with some travel may be required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in data analytics, data science, computer science, management information systems, finance, statistics, or related field required; MBA or post-graduate degree preferred
